author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-2858: PayloadProcessorProvider is no longer useable (disabled and nocommitted), as AtomicIndexReader does not know the directory() concept anymore. It can be any reader be merged in, so the selection of provider by directory can never work (and was broken before, too - e.g. for SlowIR or FilterIR).

author: kwright
msg: Part of CONNECTORS-387.  Now we can build Japanese PDFs.  Still need some structural changes and conditional font selection.
